original_text: He shall pour the water out of his buckets, and his seed shall be in many waters, and his king shall be higher than Agag, and his kingdom shall be exalted.
korean_text: 그 물통에서는 물이 넘치겠고 그 씨는 많은 물 가에 있으리로다 그의 왕이 아각보다 높으니 그의 나라가 흥왕하리로다

sentences.original_text: He shall pour the water out of his buckets,
and his seed shall be in many waters,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 씨가 많은 물 가운데 있으며,

sentences.original_text: and his king shall be higher than Agag,
and his kingdom shall be exalted.
